column5: ~~~Looking to set up a M&G in Oct. on Pigeon, and looking for info on some camps that have some Multi-bedrooms cottages, that won't cost us a leg, and an arm
stayed at pigeon lake resort last october...place was legit, dunno about pricing? but had everything you could ever need and the musky fishing right in front of the resort is bar none.
Ditto on Pigeon Lake Resort.... Great family run resort will bend over backwards to make thing great for you within reason
Pigeon Lake Resort (North End), Camp Ashtabula (Mid-Lake), Fees Landing (South End)
I live on Buckhorn Lake, close to Gannon Narrows.  Quite close to me on Pigeon is Elim Lodge.  http://www.elimlodge.com/   I have a co-worker that goes there each year and he likes it.
Newer place at the north end east of Nogies Creek on the main lake. Blue Pigeon Resort. Looks pretty nice from the lake. In a sheltered shallow bay. Don't have first hand experience
